activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7404
activity.text:
@nihal467 , I tried using the query now instead of getUserMedia to avoid the permission popup. Please verify if it works fine now.

The following are the behaviors now:

1. If mic permission is not there or blocked, the span will be visible to allow mic permission.
2. In case permission is not there and only when the user clicks on 'Start Record', the popup will appear asking for mic permission.
3. In case permission is blocked, the popup won't appear, and the span warning plus a toast message will be displayed.
4. If mic permission is allowed, there won't be such a span warning."

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7404
activity.text:
Have a look now @rithviknishad @gigincg @Ashesh3 @nihal467 
Exactly as per the behavior mentioned.

https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/78961432/c48dcfb4-ee01-46ef-9e6d-d9ba3ac17e0f

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7404
activity.text:
Okay, Got it, currently the span warning is not getting rendered if mic permission is not there and is rendering after clicking the button. 

Let me make another commit to fix it.

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7404
activity.text:
> @Spiral-Memory @nihal467 @rithviknishad
> 
> Following is the expected Behaviour:
> 
> Warning as span :
> 
> * Shown when Permission is not granted
> * Hidden when Permission is already granted
> 
> Warning as notification:
> 
> * Shown when Permission is not granted & User clicks on `Record` button

Yep! This is exactly what's happening after this PR? Is there any unexpected behavior? Please let me know. I will fix it

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7404
activity.text:
> Hey @Spiral-Memory 
> 
> Let us just confirm that doing this is okay as IIRC this was kept intentionally, don't remember the reason.

Sure @rithviknishad !

Could you please explain a little, like what's the problem ? 

When permission is not there.. that warming will be shown otherwise it's not. Please refer to the video on how i intended it to be. 

If you require any change, please let me know !
